1.0.name: wordpress/responsive-select-menu
1.0.description:
View Demo 1

View Demo 2 in a Responsive WordPress Theme

One common UI paradigm for navigation menus with responsive design is to display a select box (form element) for mobile devices. This plugin allows you to turn your WordPress 3 menu into a select box below a width of your choice.

Features

  • Takes up less screen real estate on mobile devices
  • Easier navigation for touch screens
  • Works automatically - no need to add extra PHP code

Highly Configurable

Through the Responsive Select Menu Control Panel you can:

  • New in 1.2 - select which theme locations to apply the menu to
  • Set your width breakpoint (where your menu switches from your standard menu to a select box)
  • Configure how many levels you wish to include in the select menu. Set it to 1 to inc
